DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to find patterns in the use of non-biological DMARDs as the initial treatment of RA and how adverse events (AEs), intolerance or lack of efficacy may impact therapeutic decisions in real life in the Spanish Andalusian region.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess the Management of Synthetic Disease-modifying Antirheumatic Drug (DMARD) at the Onset of Adverse Events, Intolerance or Lack of Efficacy in Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA)
